doc.title: 3 Kronen (5. Fassung)
doc.plot: Every thing communicates tension when one considers it from a particular point of view. Everything. The main actor is the camera as an organ of record. One sees a reproduced reality, against which one can check one's mechanisms of perception. (Dietmar Brehm)
